descriptions.en: Exhibiting great teamwork, they use their incisors to cut pieces out of any material that might be useful for a nest, then make off with them.
descriptions.es: Exhibiting great teamwork, they use their incisors to cut pieces out of any material that might be useful for a nest, then make off with them.
descriptions.ca: Mostrant una gran col·laboració, utilitzen les seves dents incisives per tallar peces de qualsevol material que pugui ser útil per a un niu, i després se les emporten.
